name: Quincy Bioscience
overview: Quincy Bioscience, LLC, a biopharmaceutical company, engages in the discovery, development, and commercialization of medicines to treat aging diseases. It offers Prevagen, a dietary supplement to fight aging; and Prevagen Professional for complimentary and alternative medicine practitioners. The company also researches and develops therapeutic compounds for the treatment of neurodegenerative disorders, such as Alzheimer’s disease, Parkinson’s disease, stroke, Huntington’s disease, and Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis. In addition, its products focuses on restoring calcium balance related to neurodegenerative disorders and other destructive age-related mechanisms. The company provides its products through health food stores and chain drug stores. Quincy Bioscience, LLC was formerly known as QRG Bioscience, LLC and changed its name in December, 2005. Quincy Bioscience, LLC was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Madison, Wisconsin.

milestones.description: Quincy Bioscience Receives Investment Capital from DaneVest
milestones.source_description: Quincy Bioscience Receives Investment Capital from DaneVest
